description:
Do you want to start a blog ? If yes so keep reading the complete description because you are on the right place to start a blog I guarantee you .

Ok so you decided to start a blog right no matters it is tech blog , news blog , design blog , health blog , marketing blog , education blog etc.

But the problem is you don't know how to start a blog . You don't have any knowledge to start a blog.

  • If you are going to hire a blog developer you need to arrange thousands of dollars to pay the developer .That's only to developing of the blog .
  • Definitely every bloggers needs a traffic . If you don't have traffic on your blog you are wasting your time Because if you don't have traffic you will never ever can make money with your blog
  • You need to pay the search engine optimize expert to optimize your blog So when people all around the world are searching any topic so your blog will appear on google search result


Let's say you google how to start a blog you will get a lot of websites that contains text content to start a blog I know these things are boring .

Even if you go to YouTube and search how to start a blog you will get a lot of FREE videos tutorials but they only teaches you that how to start a blog . They never show you that once you created your blog how to optimize the blog for search engines, How to optimize Blog Post for the search engines , How to make money with blog , How to secure your blog from hackers etc.

That's why i said in the beginning that you are on the right place.

Because In this course you are going to learn all the steps that are followed by world top bloggers which are following:

  1. Basic information to start a professional blog which is very important to understand
  2. You will learn step by step Building a Complete Professional Blog
  3. You will learn step by step Optimizing the blog for the search engine with Yoast Plugin. Because google and other search engines will not show your blog on their search result until you optimize it . So here in this course you will learn step by step optimizing the blog with the world top plugin Yoast .
  4. Google ranks the content . So on the blog the content is POSTS . If your content e.g. post is not optimized you will never get ranked by the google because google checks the content . So you are going to learn how to create Search Engine Optimized Post so search engines can understand that your post is awesome for the user . So it will appear on the search results.
  5. You are going to learn step by step Monetizing your blog which is used by world top blogger's .These bloggers make a lot of money with their blogs. So you will also learn step by step making money with your blog the method which is used by world top bloggers.


So i will see you in the course
title: Blogging Bundle : Start a Blog + Optimize It + Monetize It
